detail_desc: 5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Fancy dress wig made from coloured synthetic hair. Textile lining with an elasticated edge.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Cable-knit hat with a faux fur pompom.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and stand-up collar with a zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, straight T-shirt dress in viscose jersey.

Ankle-length suit trousers in washed linen with pleats at the front and an extended waistband with a button and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Pull-on trousers in a soft weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake back pockets and gently tapered legs.

Non-wired push-up bra designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem. The cotton content of the shirt jacket is partly recycled.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Blouse in airy fabric with a gathered, elasticated boat neck, long, wide raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
Leggings in a stretch cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fitted Henley top in soft, organic jersey made from a cotton blend. Deep neckline, button placket, long sleeves and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the hips with a small frill trim and a flared skirt.
Sleeveless, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey. Narrow cut at the top and a turtle neck.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with elastication at the top and narrow shoulder straps with sewn-on bows. Press-studs at the crotch and short legs with elastication and a narrow frill trim around the hems.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly, spacious side pockets, welt back pockets and a discreet coin pocket.

Checked shirt in a woven cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs with creases.

Loose-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and adjustable tab with a button at each side. Pockets in the side seams and back pockets. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Tunic in an airy weave with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Jacket in cotton denim with frayed details. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and discreet side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a cut-off hem.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons at one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey. Straight cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted, mirrored lenses.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a lightly brushed finish.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a fake fly and tapered legs with decorative seams and ribbed hems.

Sleeveless dress in striped seersucker with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back, buttons down the front and a seam at the waist. Unlined. The dress is made partly from recycled polyester.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in airy jersey with a lightly pleated texture. Slightly wider neckline and fitted style that widens at the knees. Raw edges at the neckline and hem.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, sleeveless dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a sewn-in wrapover and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.

Fully lined bikini in frill-trimmed seersucker. Top with an adjustable neck strap and a plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with an elasticated waist. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Sports bra in printed, fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back, padded cups with removable inserts and an elasticated hem. Medium support.
Pull-on trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a soft jersey lining. Wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, fake, diagonal front pockets and ribbed hems.
Jumpsuit in organic cotton-blend sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood. Contrasting colour zip, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Wedge-heel ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip at the back of the heel. Fleece linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in an organic cotton weave with a chest pocket, elastication at the back and an opening with press-studs at the crotch in sizes 4-12M. Shoulder straps that have decorative knot details at the front and cross at the back with concealed buttons at the ends. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in a jacquard weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a very wide skirt with a tulle underskirt. Lined.
Waist bag in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a zip at the top, one inner compartment and an adjustable waist strap with a metal buckle. Lined. Size approx. 5x13x20 cm.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Calf-length skirt in ribbed jersey with sewn-in wrapover, an elasticated waist and asymmetric hem.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide top in closely-woven mesh with a round neckline, print motif on the front, short cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Leggings with a print on one leg and a contrasting colour waist panel.

Short, wide dress in patterned chiffon with a mandarin collar, opening at the top and ties at the neckline. Gathered yoke at the back, long puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a gathered seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Satin lining.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Calf-length, oversized dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Long, wide sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a seam at the hips with pleats at the front. Unlined.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly with buttons, front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with a fringed hem.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Lacing and a flounced trim at the top and hem, wide shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Sandals in imitation leather with narrow straps at the front and straps that tie around the ankle. Seam around the imitation leather insoles and smooth thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Knee-length dress in a fine knit with a slight sheen. Short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist, and a flared, pleated skirt. Unlined.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in cotton corduroy with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and patch pockets at the sides. Unlined.
Wide jacket in faux fur with notch lapels, concealed press-studs at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Pyjama shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Metal glasses chain. Length approx. 80 cm.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with hard-worn details and no buttons.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in airy crêpe with a collar and concealed buttons at the front. Decorative bow at the bust, 3/4-length sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Top in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a scalloped edge and broderie anglaise at the top.
Sports shorts in heavy jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lined front with removable inserts, a racer back and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a deep, smock-trimmed neckline and short, wide sleeves.
Metal Alice band decorated with a wide metal chain.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Trousers in a wool weave. High waist with elastication at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs with creases down the front.
Make-up bag in transparent, patterned plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 8.5x10x18 cm.

Jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Calf-length, A-line skirt in a linen and viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a frill trim, and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Dress in patterned sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a gently rounded hem and a detachable, braided imitation leather belt. Unlined.
